loc2.description: A vast stirring rumbles through the plateau. Pass a Sneak (+0) check or roll a die and lose that much Stamina.
loc2.name: plateau of leng

loc1.description: Slip on wet stones and slide into a pit. Pass a Luck (+0) check to climb out. If you fail, lose 1 Sanity and stay here next turn.
loc1.name: r"lyeh

other.description: There is nothing here but barren wastes. No encounter.
